snippet.title: Everything | Gameplay Film
snippet.description:
🌏 Now on Nintendo Switch! ▶️ US - http://bit.ly/everythingNA ▶️ Europe - http://bit.ly/everythingEU
🌍 DRM free + Steam key [PC/Mac/Linux] ▶️ https://davidoreilly.itch.io/everything
🌎 Steam ▶️ http://store.steampowered.com/app/582270
🌏 PS4 ▶️ http://play.st/everything
🎶 Soundtrack ▶️ https://davidoreilly.itch.io/everything-ost

http://www.everything-game.com

Everything is narrated by the brilliant British philosopher Alan Watts. 
More info - http://everything-game.com

Music © Ben Lukas Boysen 2017
Alan Watts recordings used with permission © Alan Watts 1973
http://www.alanwatts.org/
